blocks.name: omlsilem
blocks.content: Lemma for orthomodular law in the Hilbert lattice. (Contributed by NM, 14-Oct-1999.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm omlsilem(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wceq(c0, co(c1, cva, c2)), wcel(c0, c3))
  -| wcel(c3, csh)
  -| wcel(c4, csh)
  -| wss(c3, c4)
  -| wceq(cin(c4, cfv(cort, c3)), c0h)
  -| wcel(c0, c4)
  -| wcel(c1, c3)
  -| wcel(c2, cfv(cort, c3))
} = {
  mpbird(wceq(c0, co(c1, cva, c2)), wcel(c0, c3), wcel(co(c1, cva, c2), c3))
  syl6eqel(co(c1, cva, c2), c3, c1, wceq(c0, co(c1, cva, c2)))
  syl6eq(co(c1, cva, c2), c1, co(c1, cva, c0v), wceq(c0, co(c1, cva, c2)))
  oveq2d(c1, cva, c2, c0v, wceq(c0, co(c1, cva, c2)))
  sylanblc(wceq(c0, co(c1, cva, c2)), wceq(c2, c0v), wcel(c2, c4), wcel(c2, cfv(cort, c3)))
  sylbir(wceq(c0, co(c1, cva, c2)), wcel(c2, c4), wceq(co(c0, cmv, c1), c2))
  bitri(wceq(co(c0, cmv, c1), c2), wceq(c0, co(c1, cva, c2)), wceq(co(c1, cva, c2), c0))
  hvsubaddi(c0, c1, c2)
  shelii(c0, c4)
  sselii(c2, chba, cfv(cort, c3))
  ax-mp(wss(cfv(cort, c3), chba), wcel(c3, csh))
  shocss(c3)
  eqcom(co(c1, cva, c2), c0)
  mpbii(wceq(co(c0, cmv, c1), c2), wcel(c2, c4), wcel(co(c0, cmv, c1), c4))
  mp3an(wcel(co(c0, cmv, c1), c4), wcel(c4, csh), wcel(c0, c4), wcel(c1, c4))
  sselii(c1, c4, c3)
  shsubcl(c4, c0, c1)
  eleq1(co(c0, cmv, c1), c2, c4)
  3bitr3i(wa(wcel(c2, c4), wcel(c2, cfv(cort, c3))), wceq(c2, c0v), wcel(c2, cin(c4, cfv(cort, c3))), wcel(c2, c0h))
  eleq2i(c2, cin(c4, cfv(cort, c3)), c0h)
  elin(c2, c4, cfv(cort, c3))
  elch0(c2)
  ax-mp(wceq(co(c1, cva, c0v), c1), wcel(c1, chba))
  shelii(c1, c3)
  ax-hvaddid(c1)
  eleq1(c0, co(c1, cva, c2), c3)
}

thm omlsilem(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ (c0 =(c1[+h]c2)→ c0 ∈ c3)
  ⊣ c3 ∈ SH
  ⊣ c4 ∈ SH
  ⊣ c3 ⊆ c4
  ⊣ (c4 ⋂(_|_ ` c3))= 0H
  ⊣ c0 ∈ c4
  ⊣ c1 ∈ c3
  ⊣ c2 ∈(_|_ ` c3)
} = {
  mpbird(c0 =(c1[+h]c2), c0 ∈ c3, (c1[+h]c2)∈ c3)
  syl6eqel((c1[+h]c2), c3, c1, c0 =(c1[+h]c2))
  syl6eq((c1[+h]c2), c1, (c1[+h]0h), c0 =(c1[+h]c2))
  oveq2d(c1, cva, c2, c0v, c0 =(c1[+h]c2))
  sylanblc(c0 =(c1[+h]c2), c2 = 0h, c2 ∈ c4, c2 ∈(_|_ ` c3))
  sylbir(c0 =(c1[+h]c2), c2 ∈ c4, (c0[-h]c1)= c2)
  bitri((c0[-h]c1)= c2, c0 =(c1[+h]c2), (c1[+h]c2)= c0)
  hvsubaddi(c0, c1, c2)
  shelii(c0, c4)
  sselii(c2, chba, (_|_ ` c3))
  ax-mp((_|_ ` c3)⊆ ~H, c3 ∈ SH)
  shocss(c3)
  eqcom((c1[+h]c2), c0)
  mpbii((c0[-h]c1)= c2, c2 ∈ c4, (c0[-h]c1)∈ c4)
  mp3an((c0[-h]c1)∈ c4, c4 ∈ SH, c0 ∈ c4, c1 ∈ c4)
  sselii(c1, c4, c3)
  shsubcl(c4, c0, c1)
  eleq1((c0[-h]c1), c2, c4)
  3bitr3i((c2 ∈ c4 ∧ c2 ∈(_|_ ` c3)), c2 = 0h, c2 ∈(c4 ⋂(_|_ ` c3)), c2 ∈ 0H)
  eleq2i(c2, (c4 ⋂(_|_ ` c3)), c0h)
  elin(c2, c4, (_|_ ` c3))
  elch0(c2)
  ax-mp((c1[+h]0h)= c1, c1 ∈ ~H)
  shelii(c1, c3)
  ax-hvaddid(c1)
  eleq1(c0, (c1[+h]c2), c3)
}

blocks.content: Subspace inference form of orthomodular law in the Hilbert lattice. (Contributed by NM, 14-Oct-1999.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-May-2014.) (New usage is discouraged.)

  pjhthlem2(hs1, hs2, c0, cv(hs0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))

  rexlimdv(hs2, cfv(cort, c0), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), cva, cv(hs2))), wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  3expia(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(hs2), cfv(cort, c0)), wi(wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), cva, cv(hs2))), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  dedth3h(cv(hs0), c0v, cv(hs1), c0v, cv(hs2), c0v, wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(hs2), cfv(cort, c0)), wi(wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), cva, cv(hs2))), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wi(wceq(cif(cv(hs0), c0v, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), co(cv(hs1), cva, cv(hs2))), wcel(cif(cv(hs0), c0v, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), c0)), wi(wceq(cif(cv(hs0), c0v, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), co(cif(cv(hs1), c0v, wcel(cv(hs1), c0)), cva, cv(hs2))), wcel(cif(cv(hs0), c0v, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), c0)), wi(wceq(cif(cv(hs0), c0v, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), co(cif(cv(hs1), c0v, wcel(cv(hs1), c0)), cva, cif(cv(hs2), c0v, wcel(cv(hs2), cfv(cort, c0))))), wcel(cif(cv(hs0), c0v, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), c0)))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), cif(cv(hs0), c0v, wcel(cv(hs0), c1))), wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), cva, cv(hs2))), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cif(cv(hs0), c0v, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), co(cv(hs1), cva, cv(hs2))), wcel(cif(cv(hs0), c0v, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), c0))
  eqeq1(cv(hs0), cif(cv(hs0), c0v, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), co(cv(hs1), cva, cv(hs2)))
  eleq1(cv(hs0), cif(cv(hs0), c0v, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), c0)
  imbi1d(wceq(cv(hs1), cif(cv(hs1), c0v, wcel(cv(hs1), c0))), wceq(cif(cv(hs0), c0v, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), co(cv(hs1), cva, cv(hs2))), wcel(cif(cv(hs0), c0v, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), c0), wceq(cif(cv(hs0), c0v, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), co(cif(cv(hs1), c0v, wcel(cv(hs1), c0)), cva, cv(hs2))))
  eqeq2d(cif(cv(hs0), c0v, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), co(cv(hs1), cva, cv(hs2)), co(cif(cv(hs1), c0v, wcel(cv(hs1), c0)), cva, cv(hs2)), wceq(cv(hs1), cif(cv(hs1), c0v, wcel(cv(hs1), c0))))
  oveq1(cv(hs1), cif(cv(hs1), c0v, wcel(cv(hs1), c0)), cva, cv(hs2))
  imbi1d(wceq(cv(hs2), cif(cv(hs2), c0v, wcel(cv(hs2), cfv(cort, c0)))), wceq(cif(cv(hs0), c0v, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), co(cif(cv(hs1), c0v, wcel(cv(hs1), c0)), cva, cv(hs2))), wcel(cif(cv(hs0), c0v, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), c0), wceq(cif(cv(hs0), c0v, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), co(cif(cv(hs1), c0v, wcel(cv(hs1), c0)), cva, cif(cv(hs2), c0v, wcel(cv(hs2), cfv(cort, c0))))))
  eqeq2d(cif(cv(hs0), c0v, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), co(cif(cv(hs1), c0v, wcel(cv(hs1), c0)), cva, cv(hs2)), co(cif(cv(hs1), c0v, wcel(cv(hs1), c0)), cva, cif(cv(hs2), c0v, wcel(cv(hs2), cfv(cort, c0)))), wceq(cv(hs2), cif(cv(hs2), c0v, wcel(cv(hs2), cfv(cort, c0)))))
  oveq2(cv(hs2), cif(cv(hs2), c0v, wcel(cv(hs2), cfv(cort, c0))), cif(cv(hs1), c0v, wcel(cv(hs1), c0)), cva)

  ax-mp(wcel(c0v, c0), wcel(c0, cch))
  ch0(c0)
  elimel(cv(hs2), cfv(cort, c0), c0v)
  ax-mp(wcel(c0v, cfv(cort, c0)), wcel(cfv(cort, c0), csh))
  ax-mp(wcel(cfv(cort, c0), csh), wcel(c0, csh))
  chshii(c0)
  shocsh(c0)
  sh0(cfv(cort, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs2.c(c0)

  diff.hs1.w(wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  diff.hs2.w(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c0)))
  diff.hs2.w(wcel(cv(hs0), c0))

  ⊢ c0 = c1
  ⊣ c0 ∈ CH
  ⊣ c1 ∈ SH
  ⊣ c0 ⊆ c1
  ⊣ (c1 ⋂(_|_ ` c0))= 0H
} = {
  eqssi(c0, c1)

  pjhthlem2(hs1, hs2, c0, hs0, hs0 ∈ c1)
  sheli(hs0, c1)
  rexlimdva(hs1, c0, hs0 ∈ c1, ∃(hs2 ∈(_|_ ` c0), hs0 =(hs1[+h]hs2)), hs0 ∈ c0)
  rexlimdv(hs2, (_|_ ` c0), (hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ hs1 ∈ c0), hs0 =(hs1[+h]hs2), hs0 ∈ c0)
  3expia(hs0 ∈ c1, hs1 ∈ c0, hs2 ∈(_|_ ` c0), (hs0 =(hs1[+h]hs2)→ hs0 ∈ c0))
  dedth3h(hs0, c0v, hs1, c0v, hs2, c0v, hs0 ∈ c1, hs1 ∈ c0, hs2 ∈(_|_ ` c0), (hs0 =(hs1[+h]hs2)→ hs0 ∈ c0), (if(hs0 ∈ c1, hs0, 0h)=(hs1[+h]hs2)→ if(hs0 ∈ c1, hs0, 0h)∈ c0), (if(hs0 ∈ c1, hs0, 0h)=(if(hs1 ∈ c0, hs1, 0h)[+h]hs2)→ if(hs0 ∈ c1, hs0, 0h)∈ c0), (if(hs0 ∈ c1, hs0, 0h)=(if(hs1 ∈ c0, hs1, 0h)[+h]if(hs2 ∈(_|_ ` c0), hs2, 0h))→ if(hs0 ∈ c1, hs0, 0h)∈ c0))
  imbi12d(hs0 = if(hs0 ∈ c1, hs0, 0h), hs0 =(hs1[+h]hs2), hs0 ∈ c0, if(hs0 ∈ c1, hs0, 0h)=(hs1[+h]hs2), if(hs0 ∈ c1, hs0, 0h)∈ c0)
  eqeq1(hs0, if(hs0 ∈ c1, hs0, 0h), (hs1[+h]hs2))
  eleq1(hs0, if(hs0 ∈ c1, hs0, 0h), c0)
  imbi1d(hs1 = if(hs1 ∈ c0, hs1, 0h), if(hs0 ∈ c1, hs0, 0h)=(hs1[+h]hs2), if(hs0 ∈ c1, hs0, 0h)∈ c0, if(hs0 ∈ c1, hs0, 0h)=(if(hs1 ∈ c0, hs1, 0h)[+h]hs2))
  eqeq2d(if(hs0 ∈ c1, hs0, 0h), (hs1[+h]hs2), (if(hs1 ∈ c0, hs1, 0h)[+h]hs2), hs1 = if(hs1 ∈ c0, hs1, 0h))
  oveq1(hs1, if(hs1 ∈ c0, hs1, 0h), cva, hs2)
  imbi1d(hs2 = if(hs2 ∈(_|_ ` c0), hs2, 0h), if(hs0 ∈ c1, hs0, 0h)=(if(hs1 ∈ c0, hs1, 0h)[+h]hs2), if(hs0 ∈ c1, hs0, 0h)∈ c0, if(hs0 ∈ c1, hs0, 0h)=(if(hs1 ∈ c0, hs1, 0h)[+h]if(hs2 ∈(_|_ ` c0), hs2, 0h)))
  eqeq2d(if(hs0 ∈ c1, hs0, 0h), (if(hs1 ∈ c0, hs1, 0h)[+h]hs2), (if(hs1 ∈ c0, hs1, 0h)[+h]if(hs2 ∈(_|_ ` c0), hs2, 0h)), hs2 = if(hs2 ∈(_|_ ` c0), hs2, 0h))
  oveq2(hs2, if(hs2 ∈(_|_ ` c0), hs2, 0h), if(hs1 ∈ c0, hs1, 0h), cva)
  omlsilem(if(hs0 ∈ c1, hs0, 0h), if(hs1 ∈ c0, hs1, 0h), if(hs2 ∈(_|_ ` c0), hs2, 0h), c0, c1)
  elimel(hs0, c1, c0v)
  ax-mp(0h ∈ c1, c1 ∈ SH)
  sh0(c1)
  elimel(hs1, c0, c0v)
  ax-mp(0h ∈ c0, c0 ∈ CH)
  ch0(c0)
  elimel(hs2, (_|_ ` c0), c0v)

blocks.name: hsupval2
blocks.content: Alternate definition of supremum of a subset of the Hilbert lattice. Definition of supremum in Proposition 1 of [Kalmbach] p. 65. We actually define it on any collection of Hilbert space subsets, not just the Hilbert lattice ` CH ` , to allow more general theorems. (Contributed by NM, 13-Aug-2002.) (New usage is discouraged.)

thm chsupid(setvar s0, class c0) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ CH →(\/H ` { s0 ∈ CH | s0 ⊆ c0 })= c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
} = {
  syl5eq((\/H ` { s0 ∈ CH | s0 ⊆ c0 }), c0, ⋂ { hs0 ∈ CH | ⋃ { s0 ∈ CH | s0 ⊆ c0 } ⊆ hs0 }, c0 ∈ CH)
  ax-mp((\/H ` { s0 ∈ CH | s0 ⊆ c0 })= ⋂ { hs0 ∈ CH | ⋃ { s0 ∈ CH | s0 ⊆ c0 } ⊆ hs0 }, { s0 ∈ CH | s0 ⊆ c0 } ⊆ CH)
  ssrab2(s0, cch, s0 ⊆ c0)
  chsupval2(hs0, { s0 ∈ CH | s0 ⊆ c0 })
  eqtrd(⋂ { hs0 ∈ CH | ⋃ { s0 ∈ CH | s0 ⊆ c0 } ⊆ hs0 }, c0, ⋂ { hs0 ∈ CH | c0 ⊆ hs0 }, c0 ∈ CH)
  inteqd({ hs0 ∈ CH | ⋃ { s0 ∈ CH | s0 ⊆ c0 } ⊆ hs0 }, { hs0 ∈ CH | c0 ⊆ hs0 }, c0 ∈ CH)
  rabbidv(hs0, cch, c0 ∈ CH, ⋃ { s0 ∈ CH | s0 ⊆ c0 } ⊆ hs0, c0 ⊆ hs0)
  sseq1d(⋃ { s0 ∈ CH | s0 ⊆ c0 }, hs0, c0, c0 ∈ CH)
  unimax(s0, c0, cch)
  intmin(hs0, c0, cch)
  diff.cch.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c({ s0 ∈ CH | s0 ⊆ c0 })
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ∈ CH)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)

}

  eqssd(cint(crab(hs0, cch, wss(cuni(csn(c0)), cv(hs0)))), c0, wcel(c0, cch))
  syl(wcel(c0, cch), wss(cint(crab(hs0, cch, wss(cuni(csn(c0)), cv(hs0)))), c0), wcel(c0, crab(hs0, cch, wss(cuni(csn(c0)), cv(hs0)))))
  sylibr(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c0, crab(hs0, cch, wss(cuni(csn(c0)), cv(hs0)))), wa(wcel(c0, cch), wss(cuni(csn(c0)), c0)))
  ancli(wcel(c0, cch), wss(cuni(csn(c0)), c0))
  syl(wcel(c0, cch), wss(cuni(csn(c0)), c0), wceq(cuni(csn(c0)), c0))
  eqimss(cuni(csn(c0)), c0)
  elrab(hs0, c0, cch, wss(cuni(csn(c0)), cv(hs0)), wss(cuni(csn(c0)), c0))
  sseq2(cv(hs0), c0, cuni(csn(c0)))
  intss1(c0, crab(hs0, cch, wss(cuni(csn(c0)), cv(hs0))))
  syl6eqssr(c0, cint(crab(hs0, cch, wss(cuni(csn(c0)), cv(hs0)))), cuni(csn(c0)), wcel(c0, cch))
  unisng(c0, cch)
  ssintub(hs0, cuni(csn(c0)), cch)
  diff.hs0.c(csn(c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cch)
  diff.hs0.w(wss(cuni(csn(c0)), c0))
  diff.hs0.c(cuni(csn(c0)))
}

thm chsupsn(class c0) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ CH →(\/H ` { c0 })= c0)
} = {
  eqtrd((\/H ` { c0 }), c0, ⋂ { hs0 ∈ CH | ⋃ { c0 } ⊆ hs0 }, c0 ∈ CH)
  syl(c0 ∈ CH, (\/H ` { c0 })= ⋂ { hs0 ∈ CH | ⋃ { c0 } ⊆ hs0 }, { c0 } ⊆ CH)
  snssi(c0, cch)
  chsupval2(hs0, { c0 })
  eqssd(⋂ { hs0 ∈ CH | ⋃ { c0 } ⊆ hs0 }, c0, c0 ∈ CH)
  syl(c0 ∈ CH, ⋂ { hs0 ∈ CH | ⋃ { c0 } ⊆ hs0 } ⊆ c0, c0 ∈ { hs0 ∈ CH | ⋃ { c0 } ⊆ hs0 })
  sylibr(c0 ∈ CH, c0 ∈ { hs0 ∈ CH | ⋃ { c0 } ⊆ hs0 }, (c0 ∈ CH ∧ ⋃ { c0 } ⊆ c0))
  ancli(c0 ∈ CH, ⋃ { c0 } ⊆ c0)
  syl(c0 ∈ CH, ⋃ { c0 } ⊆ c0, ⋃ { c0 } = c0)
  eqimss(⋃ { c0 }, c0)
  elrab(hs0, c0, cch, ⋃ { c0 } ⊆ hs0, ⋃ { c0 } ⊆ c0)
  sseq2(hs0, c0, ⋃ { c0 })
  intss1(c0, { hs0 ∈ CH | ⋃ { c0 } ⊆ hs0 })
  syl6eqssr(c0, ⋂ { hs0 ∈ CH | ⋃ { c0 } ⊆ hs0 }, ⋃ { c0 }, c0 ∈ CH)
  unisng(c0, cch)
  ssintub(hs0, ⋃ { c0 }, cch)
  diff.hs0.c({ c0 })
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cch)
  diff.hs0.w(⋃ { c0 } ⊆ c0)

thm shlub(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, csh), wcel(c1, csh), wcel(c2, cch)), wb(wa(wss(c0, c2), wss(c1, c2)), wss(co(c0, chj, c1), c2)))
} = {
  impbid(w3a(wcel(c0, csh), wcel(c1, csh), wcel(c2, cch)), wa(wss(c0, c2), wss(c1, c2)), wss(co(c0, chj, c1), c2))
  sylibrd(w3a(wcel(c0, csh), wcel(c1, csh), wcel(c2, cch)), wa(wss(c0, c2), wss(c1, c2)), wss(co(c0, chj, c1), c2), wss(cfv(cort, cfv(cort, cun(c0, c1))), cfv(cort, cfv(cort, c2))))
  syl5bi(w3a(wcel(c0, csh), wcel(c1, csh), wcel(c2, cch)), wa(wss(c0, c2), wss(c1, c2)), wss(cfv(cort, cfv(cort, cun(c0, c1))), cfv(cort, cfv(cort, c2))), wss(cun(c0, c1), c2))
  unss(c0, c2, c1)
  syl2anc(w3a(wcel(c0, csh), wcel(c1, csh), wcel(c2, cch)), wi(wss(cun(c0, c1), c2), wss(cfv(cort, cfv(cort, cun(c0, c1))), cfv(cort, cfv(cort, c2)))), wss(cun(c0, c1), chba), wss(c2, chba))
  unssd(c0, c1, chba, w3a(wcel(c0, csh), wcel(c1, csh), wcel(c2, cch)))
  syl(w3a(wcel(c0, csh), wcel(c1, csh), wcel(c2, cch)), wss(c0, chba), wcel(c0, csh))
  shss(c0)
  syl(w3a(wcel(c0, csh), wcel(c1, csh), wcel(c2, cch)), wss(c1, chba), wcel(c1, csh))
  shss(c1)
  3ad2ant3(wcel(c0, csh), wcel(c1, csh), wcel(c2, cch), wss(c2, chba))
  chss(c2)
  occon2(cun(c0, c1), c2)
  sseq12d(co(c0, chj, c1), c2, cfv(cort, cfv(cort, cun(c0, c1))), cfv(cort, cfv(cort, c2)), w3a(wcel(c0, csh), wcel(c1, csh), wcel(c2, cch)))
  syl2anc(w3a(wcel(c0, csh), wcel(c1, csh), wcel(c2, cch)), wceq(co(c0, chj, c1), cfv(cort, cfv(cort, cun(c0, c1)))), wcel(c0, csh), wcel(c1, csh))
  shjval(c0, c1)
  eqcomd(c2, cfv(cort, cfv(cort, c2)), w3a(wcel(c0, csh), wcel(c1, csh), wcel(c2, cch)))
  3ad2ant3(wcel(c0, csh), wcel(c1, csh), wcel(c2, cch), wceq(cfv(cort, cfv(cort, c2)), c2))
  ococ(c2)
  ex(w3a(wcel(c0, csh), wcel(c1, csh), wcel(c2, cch)), wss(co(c0, chj, c1), c2), wa(wss(c0, c2), wss(c1, c2)))
  jca(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, csh), wcel(c1, csh), wcel(c2, cch)), wss(co(c0, chj, c1), c2)), wss(c0, c2), wss(c1, c2))
  sylan(w3a(wcel(c0, csh), wcel(c1, csh), wcel(c2, cch)), wss(co(c0, chj, c1), c2), wss(c0, c2), wss(c0, co(c0, chj, c1)))
  syl2anc(w3a(wcel(c0, csh), wcel(c1, csh), wcel(c2, cch)), wss(c0, co(c0, chj, c1)), wcel(c0, csh), wcel(c1, csh))
  shub1(c0, c1)
  sstr(c0, co(c0, chj, c1), c2)
  sylan(w3a(wcel(c0, csh), wcel(c1, csh), wcel(c2, cch)), wss(co(c0, chj, c1), c2), wss(c1, c2), wss(c1, co(c0, chj, c1)))
  syl2anc(w3a(wcel(c0, csh), wcel(c1, csh), wcel(c2, cch)), wss(c1, co(c0, chj, c1)), wcel(c1, csh), wcel(c0, csh))
  simp2(wcel(c0, csh), wcel(c1, csh), wcel(c2, cch))
  simp1(wcel(c0, csh), wcel(c1, csh), wcel(c2, cch))
  shub2(c1, c0)
  sstr(c1, co(c0, chj, c1), c2)
}

thm shlub(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ SH ∧ c1 ∈ SH ∧ c2 ∈ CH)→((c0 ⊆ c2 ∧ c1 ⊆ c2)↔(c0[vH]c1)⊆ c2))
} = {
  impbid((c0 ∈ SH ∧ c1 ∈ SH ∧ c2 ∈ CH), (c0 ⊆ c2 ∧ c1 ⊆ c2), (c0[vH]c1)⊆ c2)
  sylibrd((c0 ∈ SH ∧ c1 ∈ SH ∧ c2 ∈ CH), (c0 ⊆ c2 ∧ c1 ⊆ c2), (c0[vH]c1)⊆ c2, (_|_ `(_|_ `(c0 ⋃ c1)))⊆(_|_ `(_|_ ` c2)))
  syl5bi((c0 ∈ SH ∧ c1 ∈ SH ∧ c2 ∈ CH), (c0 ⊆ c2 ∧ c1 ⊆ c2), (_|_ `(_|_ `(c0 ⋃ c1)))⊆(_|_ `(_|_ ` c2)), (c0 ⋃ c1)⊆ c2)
  unss(c0, c2, c1)
  syl2anc((c0 ∈ SH ∧ c1 ∈ SH ∧ c2 ∈ CH), ((c0 ⋃ c1)⊆ c2 →(_|_ `(_|_ `(c0 ⋃ c1)))⊆(_|_ `(_|_ ` c2))), (c0 ⋃ c1)⊆ ~H, c2 ⊆ ~H)
  unssd(c0, c1, chba, (c0 ∈ SH ∧ c1 ∈ SH ∧ c2 ∈ CH))
  syl((c0 ∈ SH ∧ c1 ∈ SH ∧ c2 ∈ CH), c0 ⊆ ~H, c0 ∈ SH)
  shss(c0)
  syl((c0 ∈ SH ∧ c1 ∈ SH ∧ c2 ∈ CH), c1 ⊆ ~H, c1 ∈ SH)
  shss(c1)
  3ad2ant3(c0 ∈ SH, c1 ∈ SH, c2 ∈ CH, c2 ⊆ ~H)
  chss(c2)
  occon2((c0 ⋃ c1), c2)
  sseq12d((c0[vH]c1), c2, (_|_ `(_|_ `(c0 ⋃ c1))), (_|_ `(_|_ ` c2)), (c0 ∈ SH ∧ c1 ∈ SH ∧ c2 ∈ CH))
  syl2anc((c0 ∈ SH ∧ c1 ∈ SH ∧ c2 ∈ CH), (c0[vH]c1)=(_|_ `(_|_ `(c0 ⋃ c1))), c0 ∈ SH, c1 ∈ SH)
  shjval(c0, c1)
  eqcomd(c2, (_|_ `(_|_ ` c2)), (c0 ∈ SH ∧ c1 ∈ SH ∧ c2 ∈ CH))
  3ad2ant3(c0 ∈ SH, c1 ∈ SH, c2 ∈ CH, (_|_ `(_|_ ` c2))= c2)
  ococ(c2)
  ex((c0 ∈ SH ∧ c1 ∈ SH ∧ c2 ∈ CH), (c0[vH]c1)⊆ c2, (c0 ⊆ c2 ∧ c1 ⊆ c2))
  jca(((c0 ∈ SH ∧ c1 ∈ SH ∧ c2 ∈ CH)∧(c0[vH]c1)⊆ c2), c0 ⊆ c2, c1 ⊆ c2)
  sylan((c0 ∈ SH ∧ c1 ∈ SH ∧ c2 ∈ CH), (c0[vH]c1)⊆ c2, c0 ⊆ c2, c0 ⊆(c0[vH]c1))
  syl2anc((c0 ∈ SH ∧ c1 ∈ SH ∧ c2 ∈ CH), c0 ⊆(c0[vH]c1), c0 ∈ SH, c1 ∈ SH)
  shub1(c0, c1)
  sstr(c0, (c0[vH]c1), c2)
  sylan((c0 ∈ SH ∧ c1 ∈ SH ∧ c2 ∈ CH), (c0[vH]c1)⊆ c2, c1 ⊆ c2, c1 ⊆(c0[vH]c1))
  syl2anc((c0 ∈ SH ∧ c1 ∈ SH ∧ c2 ∈ CH), c1 ⊆(c0[vH]c1), c1 ∈ SH, c0 ∈ SH)
  simp2(c0 ∈ SH, c1 ∈ SH, c2 ∈ CH)
  simp1(c0 ∈ SH, c1 ∈ SH, c2 ∈ CH)
  shub2(c1, c0)
  sstr(c1, (c0[vH]c1), c2)
}
